column4: just jumping in here because I've had the gnome settings error in the past, are booting from the live cd or from an installed copy of ubuntu? i got the error only when booting from the livecd & had to use the alternate cd to install
After install... not from cd (install went fine)... and I tried the alternate cd
PurpZeY, ok, just thought i'd ask the question, i'll go back to sleep for a bit now
if you're still around, i was just looking on ubuntuforums about the error & found this thread, maybe there's something in it that'll help http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=406054
